verses.text: \add This\add* then was the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*; \add even\add* to the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Zin|strong="H6790"\w* \w southward|strong="H5045"\w* \add was\add* the uttermost \w part|strong="H7097"\w* of the south \w coast|strong="H8486"\w*.

And their \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* was from the \w shore|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, from the \w bay|strong="H3956"\w* that \w looketh|strong="H6437"\w* \w southward|strong="H5045"\w*:\f + \fr 15.2 \ft bay: Heb. tongue\f*

And it went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to the south \w side|strong="H5045"\w* to \w Maaleh-acrabbim|strong="H4610"\w*, and \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* along to \w Zin|strong="H6790"\w*, and ascended \w up|strong="H5927"\w* on the south \w side|strong="H5045"\w* unto \w Kadesh-barnea|strong="H6947"\w*, and \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* along to \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w*, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Adar|strong="H0146"\w*, and fetched a \w compass|strong="H5437"\w* to \w Karkaa|strong="H7173"\w*:\f + \fr 15.3 \ft Maaleh-acrabbim: or, the going up to Acrabbim\f*

\add From thence\add* it \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* toward \w Azmon|strong="H6111"\w*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; and the goings \w out|strong="H8444"\w* of that \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* were at the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: this shall be your \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w coast|strong="H1366"\w*.

And the \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \add was\add* the \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \add even\add* unto the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*. And \add their\add* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* in the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w quarter|strong="H6285"\w* \add was\add* from the \w bay|strong="H3956"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* at the uttermost \w part|strong="H7097"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*:

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Beth-hogla|strong="H1031"\w*, and \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* along by the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* of \w Beth-arabah|strong="H1026"\w*; and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* of \w Bohan|strong="H0932"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*:

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* toward \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w* from the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Achor|strong="H5911"\w*, and so \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*, \w looking|strong="H6437"\w* toward \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, that \add is\add* \w before|strong="H5227"\w* the going \w up|strong="H4608"\w* to \w Adummim|strong="H0131"\w*, which \add is\add* on the south \w side|strong="H5045"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w*: and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* toward the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w En-shemesh|strong="H5885"\w*, and the goings \w out|strong="H8444"\w* thereof were at \w En-rogel|strong="H5883"\w*:

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* by the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hinnom|strong="H2011"\w* unto the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*; the same \add is\add* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* that \add lieth\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w Hinnom|strong="H2011"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w*, which \add is\add* at the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of the \w giants|strong="H7497"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*:

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* was \w drawn|strong="H8388"\w* from the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* unto the \w fountain|strong="H4599"\w* of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Nephtoah|strong="H5318"\w*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephron|strong="H6085"\w*; and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* was \w drawn|strong="H8388"\w* to \w Baalah|strong="H1173"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*:

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w compassed|strong="H5437"\w* from \w Baalah|strong="H1173"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w* unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, and \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* along unto the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Jearim|strong="H3297"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Chesalon|strong="H3693"\w*, on the north \w side|strong="H6828"\w*, and went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Beth-shemesh|strong="H1053"\w*, and passed \w on|strong="H5674"\w* to \w Timnah|strong="H8553"\w*:

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*: and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* was \w drawn|strong="H8388"\w* to \w Shicron|strong="H7942"\w*, and passed \w along|strong="H5674"\w* to \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Baalah|strong="H1173"\w*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto \w Jabneel|strong="H2995"\w*; and the goings \w out|strong="H8444"\w* of the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* were at the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

And the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \add was\add* to the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* \add thereof\add*. This \add is\add* the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.

¶ And unto \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w* he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* a \w part|strong="H2506"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w according|strong="H0413"\w* to the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \add even\add* the \w city|strong="H7151"\w* of \w Arba|strong="H0704"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w*, which \add city is\add* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.\f + \fr 15.13 \ft the city…: or, Kirjath-arba\f*

And \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w drove|strong="H3423"\w* thence the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w*, \w Sheshai|strong="H8344"\w*, and \w Ahiman|strong="H0289"\w*, and \w Talmai|strong="H8526"\w*, the \w children|strong="H3211"\w* of \w Anak|strong="H6061"\w*.

And he went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* thence to the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w*: and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \add was\add* \w Kirjath-sepher|strong="H7158"\w*.

¶ And \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, He that \w smiteth|strong="H5221"\w* \w Kirjath-sepher|strong="H7158"\w*, and \w taketh|strong="H3920"\w* it, to him will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Achsah|strong="H5915"\w* my \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

And \w Othniel|strong="H6274"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kenaz|strong="H7073"\w*, the \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w*, \w took|strong="H3920"\w* it: and he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him \w Achsah|strong="H5915"\w* his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

And it came to pass, as she \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \add unto him\add*, that she \w moved|strong="H5496"\w* him to \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* of her \w father|strong="H0001"\w* a \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: and she lighted \w off|strong="H6795"\w* \add her\add* \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*; and \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, What wouldest thou?

Who \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* me a \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*; for thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me a \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me also \w springs|strong="H1543"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. And he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* her the \w upper|strong="H5942"\w* \w springs|strong="H1543"\w*, and the \w nether|strong="H8482"\w* \w springs|strong="H1543"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.

And the \w uttermost|strong="H7097"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* toward the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w southward|strong="H5045"\w* were \w Kabzeel|strong="H6909"\w*, and \w Eder|strong="H5740"\w*, and \w Jagur|strong="H3017"\w*,
And \w Kinah|strong="H7016"\w*, and \w Dimonah|strong="H1776"\w*, and \w Adadah|strong="H5735"\w*,
And \w Kedesh|strong="H6943"\w*, and \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*, and \w Ithnan|strong="H3497"\w*,
\w Ziph|strong="H2128"\w*, and \w Telem|strong="H2928"\w*, and \w Bealoth|strong="H1175"\w*,
And \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*, \w Hadattah|strong="H2675"\w*, and \w Kerioth|strong="H7152"\w*, \add and\add* \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*,
\w Amam|strong="H0538"\w*, and \w Shema|strong="H8090"\w*, and \w Moladah|strong="H4137"\w*,
And \w Hazar-gaddah|strong="H2693"\w*, and \w Heshmon|strong="H2829"\w*, and \w Beth-palet|strong="H1046"\w*,
And \w Hazar-shual|strong="H2705"\w*, and \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w*, and \w Bizjothjah|strong="H0964"\w*,
\w Baalah|strong="H1173"\w*, and \w Iim|strong="H5864"\w*, and \w Azem|strong="H6107"\w*,
And \w Eltolad|strong="H0513"\w*, and \w Chesil|strong="H3686"\w*, and \w Hormah|strong="H2767"\w*,
And \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*, and \w Madmannah|strong="H4089"\w*, and \w Sansannah|strong="H5578"\w*,

And \w Lebaoth|strong="H3822"\w*, and \w Shilhim|strong="H7978"\w*, and \w Ain|strong="H5871"\w*, and \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w*: all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add are\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w nine|strong="H8672"\w*, with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*:
\add And\add* in the \w valley|strong="H8219"\w*, \w Eshtaol|strong="H0847"\w*, and \w Zoreah|strong="H6881"\w*, and \w Ashnah|strong="H0823"\w*,
And \w Zanoah|strong="H2182"\w*, and \w En-gannim|strong="H5873"\w*, \w Tappuah|strong="H8599"\w*, and \w Enam|strong="H5879"\w*,
\w Jarmuth|strong="H3412"\w*, and \w Adullam|strong="H5725"\w*, \w Socoh|strong="H7755"\w*, and \w Azekah|strong="H5825"\w*,

And \w Sharaim|strong="H8189"\w*, and \w Adithaim|strong="H5723"\w*, and \w Gederah|strong="H1449"\w*, and \w Gederothaim|strong="H1453"\w*; \w fourteen|strong="H0702"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*:\f + \fr 15.36 \ft and Gederothaim: or, or Gederothaim\f*
\w Zenan|strong="H6799"\w*, and \w Hadashah|strong="H2322"\w*, and \w Migdal-gad|strong="H4028"\w*,
And \w Dilean|strong="H1810"\w*, and \w Mizpeh|strong="H4708"\w*, and \w Joktheel|strong="H3371"\w*,
\w Lachish|strong="H3923"\w*, and \w Bozkath|strong="H1218"\w*, and \w Eglon|strong="H5700"\w*,
And \w Cabbon|strong="H3522"\w*, and \w Lahmam|strong="H3903"\w*, and \w Kithlish|strong="H3798"\w*,

And \w Gederoth|strong="H1450"\w*, \w Beth-dagon|strong="H1016"\w*, and \w Naamah|strong="H5279"\w*, and \w Makkedah|strong="H4719"\w*; \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*:
\w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w*, and \w Ether|strong="H6281"\w*, and \w Ashan|strong="H6228"\w*,
And \w Jiphtah|strong="H3316"\w*, and \w Ashnah|strong="H0823"\w*, and \w Nezib|strong="H5334"\w*,
And \w Keilah|strong="H7084"\w*, and \w Achzib|strong="H0392"\w*, and \w Mareshah|strong="H4762"\w*; \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*:
\w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*, with her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w* and her \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*:

From \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w* even unto the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, all that \add lay\add* \w near|strong="H3027"\w* \w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w*, with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*:\f + \fr 15.46 \ft near: Heb. by the place of\f*

\w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w* with her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w* and her \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*, \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w* with her \w towns|strong="H1323"\w* and her \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*, unto the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \add thereof:\add*
¶ And in the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w Shamir|strong="H8069"\w*, and \w Jattir|strong="H3492"\w*, and \w Socoh|strong="H7755"\w*,
And \w Dannah|strong="H1837"\w*, and \w Kirjath-sannah|strong="H7158"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w*,
And \w Anab|strong="H6024"\w*, and \w Eshtemoh|strong="H0851"\w*, and \w Anim|strong="H6044"\w*,
And \w Goshen|strong="H1657"\w*, and \w Holon|strong="H2473"\w*, and \w Giloh|strong="H1542"\w*; \w eleven|strong="H0259"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*:
\w Arab|strong="H0694"\w*, and \w Dumah|strong="H1746"\w*, and \w Eshean|strong="H0824"\w*,
And \w Janum|strong="H3241"\w*, and \w Beth-tappuah|strong="H1054"\w*, and \w Aphekah|strong="H0664"\w*,\f + \fr 15.53 \ft Janum: or, Janus\f*

And \w Humtah|strong="H2547"\w*, and \w Kirjath-arba|strong="H7153"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and \w Zior|strong="H6730"\w*; \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*:
\w Maon|strong="H4584"\w*, \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, and \w Ziph|strong="H2128"\w*, and \w Juttah|strong="H3194"\w*,
And \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, and \w Jokdeam|strong="H3347"\w*, and \w Zanoah|strong="H2182"\w*,
\w Cain|strong="H7014"\w*, \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, and \w Timnah|strong="H8553"\w*; \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*:
\w Halhul|strong="H2478"\w*, \w Beth-zur|strong="H1049"\w*, and \w Gedor|strong="H1446"\w*,
And \w Maarath|strong="H4638"\w*, and \w Beth-anoth|strong="H1042"\w*, and \w Eltekon|strong="H0515"\w*; \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*:

\w Kirjath-baal|strong="H7154"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*, and \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*:
In the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w Beth-arabah|strong="H1026"\w*, \w Middin|strong="H4081"\w*, and \w Secacah|strong="H5527"\w*,

And \w Nibshan|strong="H5044"\w*, and the city of \w Salt|strong="H5898"\w*, and \w En-gedi|strong="H5872"\w*; \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* with their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*.

¶ As for the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not drive them \w out|strong="H3423"\w*: but the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
